Posts.Content: Could anyone tell me how long do I have to wear the big cross your heart bra after surgery/ reconstruction, also as the cancer has now decided to visit my bones I’ve been given Ibrance and in a couple of wks I’ve to get the bone strengthening drug so I was wondering if any of you lovely people have any info on side effects etc, thanks in advance, Cathy,Â
